name: Project Cube (zzz3230)
description:
In this game you need to deliver the cube to the green zone using various platforms (for example, repulsive accelerating moving platform).

In order for the moving platform to start moving, connect it to the trigger with the mouse wheel button.

Versions:

  • 0.8 beta
    • New level (3). 
    • New mechanics: 
      • Yellow zones transforming into death.
      • Portals are denoted by the letter.
      • Checkpoint system.
  • 0.8.2 beta
    • New level (4).
    • New mechanics:
      • Unbuild zone.
    • Bug fix.
  • 0.8.3 beta
    • Bug fix.
    • Added version label.
